ref: 7141 nikārá m. ʻ tossing up, piling up or winnowing of corn ʼ lex. &rcirclemacr P. niārā m. ʻ mass of rubbish containing gold or silver ʼ; Ku. nyāro ʻ dust in a goldsmith's shop which contains atoms of gold and silver ʼ; Bi. niyārā ʻ ashes collected by a gold -- washer ʼ; Mth. niyār -- dhoā ʻ goldwasher ʼ; H. niyārā, nyā˚ m. ʻ scoria left after refining gold ʼ; M. nerā m. ʻ rubbish of a goldsmith's shop ʼ. <-> Deriv.: P. niāryā m. ʻ washer of gold and silver filings ʼ; Or. niyāriā ʻ a person who picks out different articles from a miscellaneous heap, one who searches for gold dust in a goldsmith's shop ʼ; Bi. niyā̆riyā ʻ gold -- washer ʼ; H. niyāriyā m. ʻ one who buys ashes and rubbish from a goldsmith's shop for sifting ʼ.
